titles.title: Recognizing Linemen, the profession of Linemen, and the contributions of these brave men and women to protect public safety, and expressing support of designation of April 18, 2015, as National Lineman Appreciation Day.

bill.summary:
Recognizes the efforts of linemen in keeping the electrical power on and protecting public safety.
Expresses support for the designation of National Lineman Appreciation Day.
